Basic Array Data Operations

These classes provide the fundamental operation support for all patch data operation classes. They perform operations on array data objects which form the basis for all array-based patch data types in SAMRAI. Note that some operations are shared by all numerical types (int, double, float, and dcomplex), while others are implemented in a manner specific to the type.

  • SAMRAI::math::ArrayDataBasicOps
  • SAMRAI::math::ArrayDataNormOpsComplex
  • SAMRAI::math::ArrayDataNormOpsReal
  • SAMRAI::math::ArrayDataMiscellaneousOpsReal
  • SAMRAI::math::ArrayDataNormOpsInteger
